description:
Meet the chino you've been waiting for... A modern take on a classic style, the Westover Pant for men has a contemporary look and fit with more than enough stretch to take you through your weekend escapades.

There are no rules against wearing this sustainable everyday go-to in the office either (it is a chino, after all), especially if a pop of color is just what's needed to brighten up the work day.
name: Prana Westover Pants, 32" Inseam - Mens
